title: The Next Gen Delays Keep Coming - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.18.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about delays for Deathloop and The Stanley Parable along with updates on Epic vs. Apple.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
DC FanDome is SATURDAY, and we’re treating it like Greg Miller’s personal E3. Greg and the Kinda Funny crew will be on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames all day long reacting to the panels for Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, WB Montreal’s game, the Snyder cut, and every other DC movie. It all starts at 10 am PT, so don’t miss it!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:00 -  Deathloop has been delayed @Deathloop on Twitter
00:16:45 - Will any of the 3 games mentioned above get delayed into 2021? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:29:45 - Stanley Parable Ultra Deluxe has also been delayed - Crows Crows Crows Twitter
00:32:22 - Batman Developer Rocksteady has been Accused Of Failing To Address Sexual Harassment - Ethan Gach @ Kotaku
00:37:15 - The Apple vs Epic saga continues
00:47:08 - A Firewatch movie is in the works again - Mia Galuppo @ Hollywood Reporter
00:49:35 -  DoorDash
00:52:41 - Out today
00:59:00 - Squad Up:Jeffrey P. Long (Playstation) - JeffreyPLong
00:59:28 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Blessing and Gary Whitta
